sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../component-styles/contactForm.css' function ContactForm () { const [formState , setFormState] =useState({}); const changeHandler =(event)=>{ setFormState({...formState,[event.target.fname]:event.target.value}) } const submitHandler=()=>{ const config ={ Username:'palash.deshmukh02@gmail.com', Password:'0B03BAF851426BD498FE75F37DAB504C842F', Host:'smtp.elasticemail.com', Port:2525, To : 'palash.deshmukh02@gmail.com', From : "formState.email", Subject : "This is the subject", Body :`${formState.fname} connected to you over email`, }; if(window.Email){ window.Email.send(config); } } return ( <>

Get in Touch with Me


Let's Begin the Conversation. Share a bit about yourself, and we'll reach out to you as soon as possible.

) } export default ContactForm;
